title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Transform your gardening and outdoor projects with the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart ‚Äì the rugged, versatile solution that's as tough as your biggest job. With a striking green finish, this garden cart is not just about looks, it's about providing unparalleled durability and functionality that will make every task a breeze.

**Unbeatable Strength and Capacity:**
Built with a robust steel frame and a durable steel mesh bed, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM is engineered to handle loads of up to 400 pounds. Whether you're moving garden supplies, firewood, or tools, the 3 cubic foot capacity ensures you can carry more with fewer trips.

**Adaptable for Any Task:**
The innovative design features removable side panels, allowing you to convert the cart into a flatbed in moments. This feature is perfect for hauling oversized items that wouldn't fit in a traditional garden cart.

**Ease of Movement:**
Navigate through tight spaces with ease thanks to the cart's tight turn radius and ample ground clearance. The 10-inch pneumatic tires glide over rough terrain, ensuring a smooth ride no matter where your chores take you.

**Effortless Handling:**
A straight pull handle makes maneuvering the cart simple and comfortable. The 4-wheel design adds stability, making it easier than ever to transport heavy loads across your lawn, garden, or job site.

**Hassle-Free Assembly:**
Don't waste precious time with complicated setups. The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM features quick assembly, so you can get right to work with minimal downtime.

**Built to Last:**
Confidence comes standard with a 1-year limited warranty. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your investment is protected and that this cart is built to withstand the test of time.

**Compact and Convenient:**
Measuring 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, with an overall height of 37 inches and weighing just 36.6 pounds, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM is designed for easy storage and portability.

Upgrade to the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart and experience the ease and efficiency of the ultimate gardening companion. Grab yours today and tackle your outdoor tasks with power and precision!
